Cameron Zachreson

Email More

Research Fellow In Modelling & Simulation

University of Melbourne

Cameron Zachreson is currently a Postdoctoral Research Associate with the School of Computing and Information Systems at The University of Melbourne. His role involves the development and analysis of computational models capturing the salient features of infectious disease dynamics.

Related Projects
